concept.title: Welcome to Shanks 360!
concept.shortdesc: In this room you'll find everything you need to conduct a productive and creative workshop, lecture, or conference. Navigating a college campus for the first time can be tough, but we're here to help!

conbody.p: At Virginia Tech, we always offer our guests the best quality and newest technology that we have. Below you will find a list of all the amenities available for you to use in this classroom.

ul.li: 20 outlets (15 in the floor and 5 on the wall)
Adobe Creative Cloud installed on the lab computers

conbody.p: Click through the links and you'll find more in depth information about the room and your lease. You'll also find instructions for how to use the technology in the room as well as more information about the Virginia Tech campus that will assist you in finding Shanks Hall, figuring out where to park, and where you can eat in the area.
